Name: Ridiculousness
Title: Sterling and Karrueche Tran LX
Desc: The gang finds out how not to slide down a bannister; why golf belongs on the golf course.
LongDescription: Rob, Steelo, and Karrueche Tran find out how not to slide down a bannister in Rail Wreckled; why golf belongs on the golf course in City Golf; sliding hard into the finish with Pain Skids.
